channel.title: Posts on Testing Academic Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Testing Academic Theme

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.

item.title: Pressure
item.description: You can also embed plots, for example: Note that the echo = FALSE parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.

item.title: Academic: the website designer for Hugo
item.description: Academic makes it easy to create a beautiful website for free using Markdown. Customize anything on your site with widgets, themes, and language packs. Follow our easy step by step guide to learn how to build your own free website with Academic. Check out the personal demo or the business demo of what you’ll get in less than 10 minutes. View the documentation Ask a question Request a feature or report a bug Updating?
